description:
Follow me into my personal studio while I show you all the tools and strategies I use to get awesome shading in my drawing using a 4 step approach that anyone can follow. I'll cover the tools I use, application techniques and strategies that I use in all of my drawings.


You'll Learn:

What Tools to Use

My Proven 4 Step Shading Strategy

How to Simplify Tones

How to Plan your images

How to use Contrast


This course is Jam Packed with over 46min of video with me personally guiding you thru the 4 step process I use for shading all of my drawings.

A typical art class with a private instructor costs anywhere between $75.00 (on the low end) to as high as $150+ a session. Plus, you have to travel, get comfortable in their house/studio, and lug your tools around townâ€¦

The 4 Steps to Shading Video Course is easily equal to any one time private session you can get and it's available at a FRACTION of the cost!
title: Shading Masters: The 4 Steps to Shading Drawing Course
